data.title: National Braille Press on LinkedIn: #internationalliteracyday #blind #braille #brailleisliteracy #blindness…
data.meta_description: When you become a Literacy Champion, you are helping to put braille into the hands of blind children.  Click here to join: https://lnkd.in/eDiFeRA.…
data.text:
Only a week left to grab your tickets for our next Braille and Brew! We're visiting Mighty Squirrel Brewing in Waltham to celebrate the end of the summer on August 27th at 6:30pm and we can't wait for you to try this year's flight (and pizza!!)! https://hubs.ly/Q02LQy_00 #BeerFlight #BeerTasting #MightySquirrel #BostonBeer #BrailleLiteracy Image Description: (1) The NBP and Mighty Squirrel logos with the Text Braille and Bew and Tuesday, August 27 next to a large cartoonized pint of bubbling beer (2) a man wearing a blindfold with the NBP logo across the front smiles as he sits behind a flight of four different beers on the table in front of him

We had a wonderful time last Friday at our Annual Employee Summer Outing!! This year we journeyed to the Harbor Islands by ferry to enjoy a great time as a company (Debby couldn't stop us!!). We love all our employees and are so thankful for the opportunity to take a quick retreat every summer together! #SummerOuting #EmployeeAppreciation #SmallNonProfit #BostonNonProfit #HarborIslands #GeorgesIsland #NewEnglandSummer Image Descriptions: (1) A group photo of many employees in National Braille Press (and other) shirts with trees and a vast sky in the background, (2) A smaller group photo of 6 employees, Everyone is standing close together and smiling. A small building and a hill with many trees are in the background. Many of the employees are wearing backpacks, (3) a group photo of many employees sitting together in a group on the Harbor Island ferry, many wearing blue NBP shirts (4) a different angle of a group sitting together on the ferry ride, many wearing blue NBP shirts (5) a group of three employees sitting together at a small round table with a wall of windows in the background

Test your tastebuds with a blindfolded beer drinking experience benefitting braille literacy! Braille and Brew is back at Mighty Squirrel in Waltham on August 27th at 6:30pm and we can't wait for you to try this year's flight (and pizza!!)! https://hubs.ly/Q02HyFyP0 #BeerFlight #BeerTasting #MightySquirrel #BostonBeer #BrailleLiteracy Image Description: The NBP and Mighty Squirrel logos with the Text Braille and Bew and Tuesday, August 27 next to a large cartoonized pint of bubbling beer

Who else is eagerly anticipating Paris?! We're so excited about the inclusion of braille on the Paralympic medals! These unique medals that celebrate the birthplace of braille even contain a piece of scrap iron from the Eiffel Tower, shaped like a hexagon and engraved with the Paris 2024 emblem. The front showcases a view of the Eiffel Tower from below, along with braille inscriptions and tactile line patterns for easy identification. #Paris2024 #Paralympics #BrailleMedals Image Credit: @paralympics
